薛仁貴.definition: Xue Rengui (614-683) great Tang dynasty general

薛城.definition: Xuecheng district of Zaozhuang city 棗莊市|枣庄市[Zao3 zhuang1 shi4], Shandong

薛城區.definition: Xuecheng district of Zaozhuang city 棗莊市|枣庄市[Zao3 zhuang1 shi4], Shandong

薛寶釵.definition: Xue Baochai, female character in Dream of Red Mansions, married to Jia Baoyu 賈寶玉|贾宝玉

薛居正.definition: Xue Juzheng (912-981), Song historian and compiler of History of the Five Dynasties between Tang and Song 舊五代史|旧五代史

薛福成.definition: Xue Fucheng (1838-1894), Qing official and progressive political theorist

薛稷.definition: Xue Ji (649-713), one of Four Great Calligraphers of early Tang 唐初四大家[Tang2 chu1 Si4 Da4 jia1]
